duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of reporting systems for project controls assignments.
Perform complex aspects of individual scheduling, change documentation, and cost control.
Report up to program or portfolio level, as well as train and teach other members of the PC organization with minimal oversight.
Have advanced skills in using Primavera (P6) and work independently.
Lead schedule review meetings and work with the project team to obtain information to build/update the project schedule.
Interact with individuals of varying levels of maturity in various organizations and project teams of external Suppliers/Vendors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, finance, project management, engineering, technical, or equivalent (Master's preferred)
PMI or AACE certification (PMP, CAPM, PMI-SP, AACE-CCC, AACE-PSP, AACE-CEP, AACE-EVP)
